thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: CV

author: CV
title: CV
text:
I always go to flighthub for flight research, and it always ends in a purchase. This was my 10th ticket through flighthub. I have travelled to 4 continents with flighthub tickets and never regret it.
This trip was from Canada to US during a long weekend. Again I found the best deal on Flighthub. Its easy to research because all details are broken down and quickly comparable. Based on my experience, I can always be confident I am getting the right price.
This time, upon confirming my booking on the website, I missed the optional seat assignment fee. This option was unintentionally selected and I phoned flight hub immediately to correct it. The agent quickly and effectively corrected it and refunded me the difference.
Thank you for another great stress-free experience.
